author: pk910
content:
it looks like we have mainly lighthouse & teku struggling on devnet-3 right now.
offline nodes:
lighthouse: 7/11
teku:  7/11

checked some lighthouse nodes, all with ~30-50 peers and in syncing mode with increasing distance, so not really syncing and kinda stuck with different heads.
checked some teku nodes too, they seem very busy resource wise and are throwing OutOfMemoryError & "Rejected execution on task queue" exceptions.. not following the head too.
